name: bnomei/kirby3-security-headers
description: Kirby 3 Plugin for easier Security Headers setup

scripts.dev-zip: rm kirby3-security-headers.zip; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; composer archive --format=zip --file=kirby3-security-headers; composer require getkirby/cms:'dev-master as 3.0.0'; composer dumpautoload -o;
scripts.zip: rm kirby3-security-headers.zip; composer update; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; zip -r kirby3-security-headers.zip . -x *.git*; composer require getkirby/cms:'dev-master as 3.0.0'; composer dumpautoload -o;
